name: Stickman Shadow Ninja Assassin
description:
Stickman ninja turtle is a latest modern fighting game with multiple epic enemies. Show your samurai fighting skills and start your stickamn ninja fight against warrior or other bosses who trying to defeat you on any cost. Be the best samurai legends of this shadow fight and wins the samurai fight to become the best stickman ninja assassin. Enhance your samurai skills and kill the entire vengeance to become hero of this latest ninja games 2020. Sensational teen fight with stickman ninja missions to show your best expertise to kill the entire power enemies and bosses.

** Key Features **
• Easy to play
• Fight against immortal and epic bosses
• Wide range of stickman ninja characters
• Learn samurai assassin skills before fight starts
• dazzling gameplay modes with samurai assassin arena for sword fighting
